title: Chromosome Bio & Disease
description: This course explores the fundamental mechanisms governing metabolism of eukaryotic chromosomes and human diseases resulting from malfunctioning of chromosomal maintenance.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BIOS 2600 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 2610 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 2344 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 2354 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
